q: Aaron Belkin , director of the Palm Center, said Donald Rumsfeld 's endorsement of`` Don't Ask, Don't Tell'' repeal shows support for ending the law is`` unambiguous and transcends party lines.'' We have now entered the next phase of the repeal process in which certification and implementation should be completed swiftly in keeping with the practices that have been proven to minimize any disruption to the military, Aaron Belkin added.

I have forgiven Michael Vick . From this day forward, I will no longer bash Michael Vick on my Facebook page or in this column. There will be no more references to`` scum'' or a piece of trash who shouldn't be given the privilege of playing quarterback in the NFL.
